abstract: It is traditional to proclaim a bear market when an index falls at least 20 percent from a high. That has been true for some time in the S.&P. 500, but that was mostly because of the collapse of the financials.
lead_paragraph: It is traditional to proclaim a bear market when an index falls at least 20 percent from a high. That has been true for some time in the S.&P. 500, but that was mostly because of the collapse of the financials.
